articles.author: DAVID KOENIG AP airlines writer
articles.title: American Airlines flight attendants ask for permission to strike. Southwest pilots could be next - ABC News
articles.description: AA flight attendants seek permission to strike. Southwest pilots could be next.
articles.content:
FORT WORTH, Texas -- FORT WORTH, Texas (AP) 
American Airlines flight attendants are asking federal officials for the right to go on strike, possibly before the end of the Christmas and New Year's t… [+4559 chars]

articles.author: Max Hunder, Tom Balmforth
articles.title: US defence chief Austin visits Kyiv, announces more military aid - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. Secretary of Defence Lloyd Austin announced $100 million in new military aid to Ukraine during an unannounced visit to Kyiv on Monday, pledging long-term American support amid growing concerns about the sustainability of vital U.S. assistance.
articles.content: KYIV, Nov 20 (Reuters) - U.S. Secretary of Defence Lloyd Austin announced $100 million in new military aid to Ukraine during an unannounced visit to Kyiv on Monday, pledging long-term American suppor… [+3833 chars]
